comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly the wife of en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_McManus If so, she's "the former Florence Bergere." They were married in 1909 and the Los Angeles Herald, Volume 36, Number 95, 4 January 1909 cdnc.ucr.edu/cgi-bin/cdnc?a=d&d=LAH19090104.2.21 has a picture that could be of the same woman, although this Bain photo suggests she had put on a bit of weight.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: The chin convinces.  We'll add her full name to the record.  Thanks!
